A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie was an insult to the Star Wars Universe and its philosophy\, and of course to the fans. What a shame\, all those resources were wasted on such a horrible movie. Even the prequels are more original and consistent than this garbage. We took George Lucas for granted\, and now that he's gone\, all we have is Disney's horrible vision of Star Wars\, which is all about making easy money.
